title: super easy ID (but I'm banging my head against the wall)
content:
Any help with this ID would be appreciated. It's also used in Sunset magazine.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131104004338im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hdrLogo_5176.jpg)
author: nvhladek

comments.content:
Thanks. That's what I thought it was. The designer must have tweaked the 'e', however, which misled me.

--  
Nick Hladek
